title: Three hounter boarder
body:
i complete the missions all i get the three hounter boa
rder but i get only the icon and not the borders for loading screen, why ?

replies.body: Completing the missions doesn't unlock the project borders. You need to use 80 (?) tokens to craft the icon that enables those 3 borders.

The borders themselves aren't items you'll see in your collection anywhere, they're tied to the icon itself I believe. Once you have the icon unlocked, using one of the 3 new project skins (Vayne, Vi, or Jhin's) will have the border activated. If you don't see it on the loading screen, take a screenshot and send that over so we can try and figure out what's going wrong!
